name: resume-extractor-backend
description: Backend for email resume extraction system

scripts.kill: powershell -Command "Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 5000 -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -ExpandProperty OwningProcess | ForEach-Object { Stop-Process -Id $_ -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }"
scripts.restart: npm run kill && timeout /t 2 /nobreak >nul 2>&1 && npm start
